sqlMap.update: UPDATE team SET team_name = #name#, team_leader_id = #leader.id#, team_home_base = #homeBase#, team_color = #color#, team_description = #description# WHERE team_id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM player, membership WHERE membership.team_id = #value# AND player.player_id = membership.player_id AND status = 'accepted'
SELECT * FROM membership, team WHERE membership.player_id = #value# AND team.team_id = membership.team_id AND membership.status = 'accepted'
SELECT * FROM membership, team WHERE membership.player_id = #value# AND team.team_id = membership.team_id AND membership.status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM team ORDER BY now() - team_creation_timestamp LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM team, ( SELECT COUNT(visit_id), visit_team_id FROM visit GROUP BY visit_team_id) temp WHERE team_id = temp.visit_team_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM team, ( SELECT team_owner_id, COUNT(location_id) FROM location GROUP BY team_owner_id) temp WHERE team_id = temp.team_owner_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT team.team_id, team_name, team_color, team_description, team_home_base, team_creation_timestamp, team_leader_id FROM membership JOIN team ON membership.team_id = team.team_id WHERE membership.player_id = 4 AND status = 'accepted') temp WHERE team_id NOT IN ( SELECT team.team_id FROM membership JOIN team ON membership.team_id = team.team_id WHERE membership.player_id = 6 AND status != 'rejected')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE membership SET status = 'accepted' WHERE team_id = #teamId# AND player_id = #userId#
UPDATE membership SET status = 'rejected' WHERE team_id = #teamId# AND player_id = #userId#
